meta.notes: All numeric values are precomputed. Runtime units: frequency=Hz, time=ms (lifetimes), energy=eV. Use hbar_sim=1 for simulation (internal convention).

physical_constants.notes: Constants are CODATA / SI exact values used for conversions.

S1/2.notes: Reference ground electronic energy (2S1/2) set to 0 eV

F1.label: 2S1/2 F=1
F1.notes: Energy above F=0 = h * nu_HFS (Han et al. 2023 measurement).
sources: Han et al., 'Precise determination of ground-state hyperfine splitting and calculation of Zeeman coefficients for 171Yb+ microwave frequency standard' (arXiv 2023 / published).

P1/2.label: 2P1/2 (excited)

to_D3/2.source: Olmschenk et al., experimental branching measurement.

hyperfine.notes: Excited-state P1/2 hyperfine splitting often used in experiments (≈2.105 GHz); flagged approximate — see cited experimental descriptions and theses that use 2.105 GHz for EOM/AOM sidebands on 369 nm.

sources: Olmschenk et al., 'Manipulation and detection of a trapped hyperfine qubit' (Phys. Rev. A 76, 052314 (2007)) and later lifetime/branching works.
General experimental descriptions / NIST energy level references.

P3/2.label: 2P3/2
P3/2.notes: Higher excited P state; hyperfine constants measured (Feldker et al. 2018). See sources.
P3/2.hyperfine_note: A(2P3/2) = 875.4(10) MHz from Feldker et al., PRA 2018 (used if you include P3/2 in simulation).
sources: Feldker et al., 'Spectroscopy of the 2S1/2 -> 2P3/2 transition in Yb II: isotope shifts, hyperfine splitting and branching ratios' (Phys. Rev. A 97, 032511 (2018) / arXiv:1711.04667).

D3/2.label: 2D3/2
D3/2.notes: Metastable D3/2; repumped with 935.2 nm. Lifetime ≈ 52.7 ms from lifetime-measurement literature and reviews.
sources: Lifetime and branching reviews / measurement compilations (see arXiv:2012.14187 review and earlier lifetime measurement literature).

D5/2.label: 2D5/2
D5/2.notes: Metastable D5/2; lifetime ≈7.2 ms (commonly used experimental value).
sources: Lifetime measurement literature and reviews (standard Yb+ experimental references).

F7/2.label: 2F7/2 (octupole clock state)
F7/2.notes: Very long-lived; see Lange et al. PRL 2021 and related level studies.
sources: Lange et al., PRL 127, 213001 (2021) and related reviews.

derived.notes: Used for convenience: 1 eV = (h * c / lambda) mapping; numeric eV->Hz factor included.

sources.NIST_ASD: NIST Atomic Spectra Database / Yb II energy levels and wavelengths (canonical reference for level energies and wavelengths).
sources.Han2023_nuHFS: J. Z. Han et al., 'Precise determination of ground-state hyperfine splitting and calculation of Zeeman coefficients for 171Yb+ microwave frequency standard' (arXiv 2023 / published manuscript).
sources.Olmschenk2007_2009: C. Olmschenk et al., 'Manipulation and detection of a trapped hyperfine qubit' (PRA 76 052314 (2007)) and Olmschenk et al., PRA 80 022502 (2009) for lifetimes/branching discussion.
sources.Feldker2018: T. Feldker et al., 'Spectroscopy of the 2S1/2 -> 2P3/2 transition in Yb II: isotope shifts, hyperfine splitting and branching ratios' (PRA 97, 032511 (2018), arXiv:1711.04667).
sources.D_level_review: arXiv:2012.14187 (level & lifetime summary; D-level and branching results).
sources.Lange2021_F7: Lange et al., PRL 127, 213001 (2021) (F7/2 lifetime/clock-state measurements).
